blogPost.excerpt: Create your video once - publish it everywhere. Cut different pieces of content from your video and change the aspect ratio to share them across all your social networks.
blogPost.body: Create your video once - publish it everywhere. Cut different pieces of content from your video and change the aspect ratio to share them across all your social networks.
blogPost.title: Repurpose Video Content - Cherry-pick highlights & turn them into standalone videos 🍒
blogPost.author: Hiten Shah

localize.description: 一次性创建您的视频 - 到处发布。从您的视频中剪切不同的内容，并改变长宽比，以便在您的所有社交网络上分享它们。
localize.tagline: 挑选亮点并将其转化为独立的视频 🍒。

localize.description: 一次性創建您的視頻 - 到處發佈。從您的視頻中剪切不同的內容，並改變長寬比，以便在您的所有社交網絡上分享它們。
localize.tagline: 挑選亮點並將其轉化爲獨立的視頻 🍒。

previous.excerpt: Work faster with parts suppliers from idea to production. Get instant quotes for your designs, source new verified suppliers around the world, get feedback directly from suppliers to avoid mistakes and produce even the most complex parts with minimum delays.
previous.title: Jiga - Build hardware faster

localize.description: 从创意到生产，与零部件供应商合作更快。为您的设计获取即时报价，在全球范围内寻找新的经过验证的供应商，直接从供应商处获得反馈，以避免错误，并以最少的延误生产最复杂的零件。
從創意到生產，與零部件供應商合作更快。爲您的設計獲取即時報價，在全球範圍內尋找新的經過驗證的供應商，直接從供應商處獲得反饋，以避免錯誤，並以最少的延誤生產最複雜的零件。

next.excerpt: Universal widgets, charts and ready-to-use screens collected and coded. Get perfectly coded website or web-application with helpful tools included. Package includes HTML, CSS, JS code and Figma sources.
next.title: Motherboard Dashboards - Fully coded design solution for web-applications creating

localize.description: 收集和编码的通用部件、图表和即用屏幕。获得完美编码的网站或网络应用，包括有用的工具。包包括HTML，CSS，JS代码和Figma源。
localize.tagline: 完全编码的网络应用程序的设计解决方案，创建

localize.description: 收集和編碼的通用部件、圖表和即用屏幕。獲得完美編碼的網站或網絡應用，包括有用的工具。包包括HTML，CSS，JS代碼和Figma源。
localize.tagline: 完全編碼的網絡應用程序的設計解決方案，創建
